00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   ChangeTempo.h
00006 
00007   Vaughan Johnson, Dominic Mazzoni
00008   
00009   Change Tempo effect provides speeding up or 
00010   slowing down tempo without changing pitch.
00011 
00012 **********************************************************************/
00013 
00014 #if USE_SOUNDTOUCH
00015 
00016 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_CHANGETEMPO__
00017 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_CHANGETEMPO__
00018 
00019 #include "SoundTouchEffect.h"
00020 
00021 #include <wx/intl.h>
00022 #include <wx/dialog.h>
00023 #include <wx/slider.h>
00024 
00025 class wxString;
00026 class wxTextCtrl;
00027 
00028 
00029 class EffectChangeTempo : public EffectSoundTouch {
00030 
00031  public:
00032    EffectChangeTempo();
00033 
00034    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00035       return wxString(_("Change Tempo..."));
00036    }
00037 
00038    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00039       std::set<wxString> result;
00040       result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#PitchAndTempo"));
00041       return result;
00042    }
00043 
00044    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00045       return wxString(wxT("ChangeTempo"));
00046    }
00047 
00048    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00049       return wxString(_("Changing Tempo"));
00050    }
00051    
00052    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00053    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00054 
00055    virtual bool Init();
00056 
00057    virtual bool PromptUser();
00058    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00059 
00060    virtual bool CheckWhetherSkipEffect() { return (m_PercentChange == 0.0); }
00061    virtual bool Process();
00062   
00063  private:
00064    double         m_PercentChange;  // percent change to apply to tempo
00065                                     // -100% is meaningless, but sky's the upper limit
00066    unsigned int   m_FromBPM;        // user-set beats-per-minute. Zero means not yet set.
00067    unsigned int   m_ToBPM;          // Zero value means not yet set.
00068    double         m_FromLength;     // starting length of selection
00069    double         m_ToLength;       // target length of selection
00070 
00071 friend class ChangeTempoDialog;
00072 };
00073 
00074 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 // ChangeTempoDialog
00076 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078 class ChangeTempoDialog:public EffectDialog {
00079  public:
00080    ChangeTempoDialog(EffectChangeTempo * effect, 
00081                      wxWindow * parent);
00082 
00083    void PopulateOrExchange(ShuttleGui & S);
00084    bool TransferDataToWindow();
00085    bool TransferDataFromWindow();
00086 
00087  private:
00088    // handlers
00089    void OnText_PercentChange(wxCommandEvent & event);
00090    void OnSlider_PercentChange(wxCommandEvent & event);
00091    void OnText_FromBPM(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00092    void OnText_ToBPM(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00093    void OnText_ToLength(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00094 
00095    void OnPreview( wxCommandEvent &event );
00096 
00097    // helper fns
00098    void Update_Text_PercentChange(); // Update control per current m_PercentChange.
00099    void Update_Slider_PercentChange(); // Update control per current m_PercentChange.
00100    void Update_Text_ToBPM(); // Use m_FromBPM & m_PercentChange to set new m_ToBPM & control.
00101    void Update_Text_ToLength(); // Use m_FromLength & m_PercentChange to set new m_ToLength & control.
00102 
00103  private:
00104    EffectChangeTempo * mEffect;
00105    bool m_bLoopDetect;
00106 
00107    // controls
00108    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_PercentChange;
00109    wxSlider *     m_pSlider_PercentChange;
00110    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_FromBPM;
00111    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_ToBPM;
00112    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_FromLength;
00113    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_ToLength;
00114 
00115  public:
00116    // effect parameters
00117    double         m_PercentChange;  // percent change to apply to tempo
00118                                     // -100% is meaningless, but sky's the upper limit.
00119                                     // Slider is (-100, 200], but textCtrls can set higher.
00120    unsigned int   m_FromBPM;        // user-set beats-per-minute. Zero means not yet set.
00121    unsigned int   m_ToBPM;          // Zero value means not yet set.
00122    double         m_FromLength;     // starting length of selection
00123    double         m_ToLength;       // target length of selection
00124 
00125  private:
00126    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00127 };
